mapper.insert: insert into comment(order_id, rate, description) values (#{order_id}, #{rate}, #{description});
mapper.select: select c.id,c.order_id, c.rate,c.description,c.time, ui.avatar_url as avater from comment c join `order` o on c.order_id = o.id join good g on o.good_id = g.id join user_info ui on o.buyer_id = ui.id where g.seller_id=#{user_id} order by c.id desc;
